dict.acceptation: 耳朵；听觉，听力；耳状物；穗；

sent.orig: Near an ear, a nearer ear, a nearly eerie ear.
sent.trans: 靠近一只耳朵，一只近一些的耳朵，一只近乎可怕的耳朵。

sent.orig: HRCT can show clearly the structure of the external ear, middle ear and internal ear.
sent.trans: 结果 ：HRCT能清楚显示外耳、中耳、及内耳结构。

sent.orig: He was grinning from ear to ear.
The boy grinned from ear to ear when I gave him the apple.
sent.trans: 当我给这个孩子苹果时，他咧着嘴笑了起来。

sent.orig: After the ear wax earwax is gone, gently dry the ear.
sent.trans: 当耳垢清除了之后，将耳朵擦干。
